@dev EIP 2771 version
 NOTE:
 - It is not clear if it is actually from the EIP 2771....

devdoc.author: Superfluid
devdoc.details: A contract must implement this interface in order to support relayed transactionsIt is better to inherit the BaseRelayRecipient as its implementation

isTrustedForwarder(address).details: the forwarder is required to verify the sender's signature, and verify      the call is not a replay.

versionRecipient().details: EIP 2771 version NOTE: - It is not clear if it is actually from the EIP 2771.... - https://docs.biconomy.io/guides/enable-gasless-transactions/eip-2771

devdoc.title: Relay recipient interface

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: Returns if the forwarder is trusted to forward relayed transactions to us.
